issue: Inefficient use of memory by reading entire files into memory
old_code:
with open(file_path, 'r') as file:
    content = file.read()
benefit: Reduces memory usage by reading files line-by-line instead of loading the entire file into memory at once. This can significantly improve performance for large files or when combining many files.
commit_message: Optimize memory usage by reading files line-by-line
